summary: This test suite aggregates pytest-based unit tests for the various I/O plugins of the flight‑track component within the MSS library. Each test file exercises a specific format (CSV, Flitestar, GPX, KML, plain text), checking that waypoint data can be correctly loaded from source files and saved back, and that the plugins integrate properly with the core library.
business_intent: Ensure reliable import and export of flight‑track waypoint information across multiple file formats, validate plugin integration, and safeguard data integrity through automated testing.
